title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
After another loss, Colin explains why this disappointing season for the Lakers won't be held against LeBron James and his legacy. He believes Tom Brady is the greatest of all time but was not the sole reason the Buccaneers won the Super Bowl last year. He also tells you why this one NBA superstar is fun to watch but won't last as a championship contender. Plus, President of the UFC Dana White joins the show to give an update on when we can expect to see Conor McGregor back inside the octagon. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
